languages.text: {n}Взгляд Хейнрикса становится задумчивым, дознаватель смотрит куда-то сквозь вас.{/n} "Признаться, я даже не уверен в том, что те, о ком мне известно, все еще живы. Некогда я работал с другими аколитами Лорд-инквизитора, но в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} я действовал в одиночку".

traits.locale_text: {n}Взгляд Хейнрикса становится задумчивым, дознаватель смотрит куда-то сквозь вас.{/n} "Признаться, я даже не уверен в том, что те, о ком мне известно, все еще живы. Аколиты редко работают вместе. Большую часть времени мы действуем самостоятельно".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's expression becomes pensive, and he seems to look through you to something beyond.{/n} "To be honest, I'm not even certain that the people I know are still alive. I used to work with other acolytes of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, I have been working alone."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Хейнрикса становится задумчивым, дознаватель смотрит куда-то сквозь вас.{/n} "Признаться, я даже не уверен в том, что те, о ком мне известно, все еще живы. Некогда я работал с другими аколитами Лорд-инквизитора, но в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} я действовал в одиночку".

I used to work with other followers of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the Koronus Expanse, I have been working alone."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

I used to work with other followers of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the Koronus Expanse, I have been working alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's expression becomes pensive, and he seems to look through you to something beyond.{/n} "To be honest, I'm not even certain that the people I know are still alive. I used to work with other acolytes of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, I have been working alone."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希看起来似乎是在深思。他的目光似乎要透过你，看到更远的地方。{/n}“老实说，我甚至不确认我认识的那些人是否还活着。我曾与大审判官的其他侍仆共事过，但在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，我一直都在独自工作。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression becomes pensive, and he seems to look through you to something beyond.{/n} "To be honest, I'm not even certain that the people I know are still alive. I used to work with other acolytes of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, I have been working alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看起来似乎是在深思。他的目光似乎要透过你，看到更远的地方。{/n}“老实说，我甚至不确认我认识的那些人是否还活着。我曾与审判长的其他侍仆共事过，但在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，我一直都在独自工作。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression becomes pensive, and he seems to look through you to something beyond.{/n} "To be honest, I'm not even certain that the people I know are still alive. I used to work with other acolytes of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the Koronus Expanse, I have been working alone."

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Heinrix se vuelve pensativa y parece atravesarte con la mirada para ver más allá.{/n} «Sinceramente, ni siquiera puedo afirmar con certeza que los que conozco sigan vivos. Antes trabajaba con otros acólitos del Lord Inquisidor, pero he estado trabajando solo desde que llegué a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression becomes pensive, and he seems to look through you to something beyond.{/n} "To be honest, I'm not even certain that the people I know are still alive. I used to work with other acolytes of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, I have been working alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Heinrix se vuelve pensativa y parece atravesarte con la mirada para ver más allá.{/n} «Sinceramente, ni siquiera puedo afirmar con certeza que los que conozco sigan vivos. Antes trabajaba con otros acólitos del Lord Inquisidor, pero he estado trabajando solo desde que llegué a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは物思いにふけったような表情をしていた。それはまるで、あなたを通して向こうの何かを見ているようだ。{/n}「正直なところ、私が知っている人たちがまだ生きているかどうかも定かではない。以前はロード・インクィジターの他のアコライトと一緒に仕事をしていたが、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}ではひとりきりだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression becomes pensive, and he seems to look through you to something beyond.{/n} "To be honest, I'm not even certain that the people I know are still alive. I used to work with other acolytes of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, I have been working alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは物思いにふけったような表情をしていた。それはまるで、あなたを通して向こうの何かを見ているようだ。{/n}「正直なところ、私が知っている人たちがまだ生きているかどうかも定かではない。以前はロード・インクィジターの他のアコライトと一緒に仕事をしていたが、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}ではひとりきりだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Miene nimmt einen nachdenklichen Ausdruck an, und er scheint durch dich hindurchzusehen.{/n} "Offen gestanden bin ich nicht einmal sicher, ob diejenigen, die ich kenne, noch leben. Ich habe früher mit anderen Akolythen des Großinquisitors zusammengearbeitet, doch in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} arbeite ich alleine."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression becomes pensive, and he seems to look through you to something beyond.{/n} "To be honest, I'm not even certain that the people I know are still alive. I used to work with other acolytes of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, I have been working alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Miene nimmt einen nachdenklichen Ausdruck an, und er scheint durch dich hindurchzusehen.{/n} "Offen gestanden bin ich nicht einmal sicher, ob diejenigen, die ich kenne, noch leben. Ich habe früher mit anderen Akolythen des Großinquisitors zusammengearbeitet, doch in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} arbeite ich alleine."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le regard d'Heinrix se perd au loin et son expression se fait pensive.{/n} « Pour être honnête, je ne sais même pas si ceux que je connais sont encore vivants. Avant, je travaillais aux côtés d'autres acolytes du seigneur inquisiteur, mais j'ai toujours opéré seul dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression becomes pensive, and he seems to look through you to something beyond.{/n} "To be honest, I'm not even certain that the people I know are still alive. I used to work with other acolytes of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, I have been working alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard d'Heinrix se perd au loin et son expression se fait pensive.{/n} « Pour être honnête, je ne sais même pas si ceux que je connais sont encore vivants. Avant, je travaillais aux côtés d'autres acolytes du seigneur inquisiteur, mais j'ai toujours opéré seul dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in gözleri dalıyor. Sanki sana değil de arkandaki bir şeye bakıyor.{/n} "Ne yalan söyleyeyim... O tanıdıklarım hâlâ yaşıyor mu onu bile bilmiyorum. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun başka havarileriyle çalışmışlığım var ama {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} hep yalnızdım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression becomes pensive, and he seems to look through you to something beyond.{/n} "To be honest, I'm not even certain that the people I know are still alive. I used to work with other acolytes of the Lord Inquisitor, but in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, I have been working alone."

Lord Engizisyoncu'nun başka havarileriyle çalışmışlığım var ama {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nde hep yalnızdım."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
